caption:
Dealing with a difficult HOA in San Diego? Our attorney Scott McDonald compares problematic San Diego HOAs to schoolyard bullies on our latest #BadHOA podcast episode.

We dive deep into San Diego’s unique HOA landscape, examining the water intrusion and mold issues common in coastal communities, noise disputes in downtown high-rises, and board power dynamics throughout the county.

Scott shares a shocking story about a San Diego condo owner whose roof literally collapsed into his bedroom after the HOA repeatedly ignored maintenance requests! Plus, we break down a real Reddit post about excessive noise fines in a downtown San Diego high-rise.

Learn specific strategies for San Diego homeowners, including how to communicate effectively with difficult boards, when to pay fines under protest, and exactly when to consult with a San Diego HOA attorney.

You can listen/watch the entire podcast episode as well as read the blog post we put together packed with helpful insights on our website:
https://lscarlsonlaw.com/articles/san-diego-hoa-attorney-guide
